column2: A Cool Oasis For a Hot Summer Day
Turtles, koi fish and flowers, oh my!
Gem in the middle of UCLA campus
A place to relax and enjoy a variety of nature
Peaceful place to walk near the W Hotel
Peaceful getaway in the middle of city streets
oasis of peaceful calm, with turles, benches, a stream in a gorgeous small botanical garden. If at UCLA, visit here.
A Restful, If Not Quiet, Oasis In Los Angeles
